subject: Shipping state Order #SSN5277
description_text: Hi there, refered to my purchase there is the shipping with reference: SF6047201468670 when i try to get an actual state it says, that there is no shipping item in the system. Could you Please help me and send me the actual state of shipping? Thanks and regards Sebastian

Hi Sebastian Weidlich,    We apologize for the delayed response—we've just returned from vacation. Here is your shipping tracking link. The product you purchased has been out of stock for nearly two weeks due to overwhelming demand. We will ship it to you within the next couple of days.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047201468670    The pedal has been delivered.
